title: libert19
author: libert19
created_time: May 23, 2023, 10:27:25 AMLast edit: May 30, 2023, 05:16:19 AM by libert19
content: Just read newsletter. Snapshot not done yet. Here is proposal link: https://gov.osmosis.zone/discussion/11472-rfc-proposal-for-a-public-goods-partnership-between-namada-and-osmosisI see no reason why this wouldn't get passed, wouldn't hurt to buy $osmo, even in itself Osmosis is thriving chain. NFA. Edit: There could be $Nam airdrop to zcash holders as well, read proposal here, jump to section 'Airdrop for Zec holders' for info.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Thanks for sharing the news hereCurrently, the OSMO token price is 94% discounted from its highest price. Eligible to buy, when the proposal is approved there is a possibility that the price will increase due to airdrop enthusiasts.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Is the proposal has been approved yet?If the snapshot has done than there are so much people who cant participate in this airdrop   since it is already happen but why i didn hear any news from the big exchanges, because usually they will take participate in any kind of airdrop

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on June 02, 2023, 02:50:09 AMIs the proposal has been approved yet?It's in RFC (Request For Comments) stage, yet to be posted in Osmosis governance. QuoteIf the snapshot has done than there are so much people who cant participate in this airdrop   since it is already happen but why i didn hear any news from the big exchanges, because usually they will take participate in any kind of airdrop  Regarding snapshot it's mentioned in proposal. QuoteA snapshot date has not yet been decided, but it will be after the publication of this postYou will hear from exchanges once the proposal has passed.
